review: I bought the Fire TV because I already own an Apple TV and tend to be an Apple junkie, but I love Amazon so I thought I'd compare the two. I have to say, I'm really loving the Fire TV. It has access to the massive Prime Video Library, which is what is missing from my Apple TV. The setup was extremely easy, and the remote has an awesome voice activated control on it, another thing missing from the Apple TV remote. You can also pick and choose which apps you want on your home screen, which is nice. The only qualm I have with the Fire TV is that you can't mirror your computer or tablet onto the TV unless it is a Fire tablet or phone. I'd like to be able to mirror my computer, though I understand why I can't mirror my iPhone or iPad. Overall, I am really impressed with it and am enjoying the wide variety of apps.
